meanings.definition: (植物学)胚珠が横向きで、珠孔が上向きまたは下向きであること。
meanings.english_definition: (botany) Having ovules that are horizontal with the micropyle facing upward or downward.

etymology.value: dia- (横切る) + meso- (中間) + -gamous (生殖)。胚珠の向きを示す専門用語。

usage_notes.explanation: 植物学の専門用語であり、一般的な会話では使用されません。

readability_explanation.text: This is a highly specialized botanical term used to describe the orientation of ovules in plants. It is unlikely to be encountered outside of academic or technical contexts related to botany.
